title: Was Rambede Ann Dol a model after he killed a child with a vaccine?
subtitle: Rambede Ann's manufacturer patented the doll several months before his daughter's illness and died, making an old claim about vaccines impossible in time.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Ann's naked dolls were made by a grieving father who lost his daughter because of a vaccine-related disease and wanted to spread the risk of vaccination.
